QString DzSkinFileLoader::getFileDir (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
the directory of the file
QString DzSkinFileLoader::getFileText (  )  [virtual, slot]
Returns:
the contents of the file. It replaces the following placeholder text in the file with the appropriate directory: RESOURCE_DIR%, FILE_DIR%, and SKIN_DIR%
See also:
getRawFileText()

the text contained in the file
